job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Join us as we pursue our disruptive new vision to make machine data accessible usable and valuable to everyone We are a company filled with people who are passionate about our product and seek to deliver the best experience for our customers At Splunk were committed to our work customers having fun and most importantly to each others success Learn more about Splunk careers and how you can become a part of our journeyltbrgtltbrgtWe give our engineers an environment in which they can contribute from day one while also providing opportunities for learning and growth You will learn how our entire stack works  from data ingestion storage search and analytics to implementing dashboards and tools to support operational requirementsltbrgtltstronggtRole ltbrgtltstronggtSplunk is looking for a Front Endfocused Software Engineer to join the effort in the development of Security Products and Applications on Cloud You will get to work with a super smart bunch of folks who are doing state of the art development work in both the and back end You will be interacting with product management customers and other engineering teams across Splunk to understand detailed requirementsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt4 years of experience building front end applications UI components or UI frameworksltligtltligtBachelors degree in Computer Science Mathematics or another quantitative fieldltligtltligtStrong front end development skills particularly in JavaScript and React TypescriptltligtltligtUnderstanding of GraphQL CSS3ltligtltligtKnowledge of REST APIs and JSONltligtltligtKnowledge of reactredux or similar technologiesltligtltligtExperience collaborating with design product and cross functional engineering teamsltligtltligtProven ability to develop and own moderate complexity features or subsystemsltligtltulgtltstronggtAdditional Knowledge Skills and Abilities ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtPassionate about developer productivityltligtltligtFinds value in writing Unit Tests and Functional testsltligtltligtThinks about the customer user experience while keeping efficient performance in mindltligtltligtAbility to learn new technologies quickly and mentor junior team membersltligtltligtStrong communication skillsltligtltulgtltstronggtPreferences ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtFull web stack development experienceltligtltligtStrong NodeJS fundamentalsltligtltligtAPI design skillsltligtltligtAccessibility experienceltligtltulgtltstronggtWhat We Offer You ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtA constant stream of new things for you to learn We are always expanding into new areas bringing in opensource projects and contributing back and exploring new technologiesltligtltligtA set of exceptionally hardworking and dedicated peers from engineering and QA to product management and customer supportltligtltligtGrowth and mentorship We believe in growing engineers through ownership and leadership opportunities We also believe mentors help both sides of the equationltligtltligtA stable collaborative and encouraging work environmentltbrgtltligtltulgtWe value diversity at our company All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin or any other applicable legally protected characteristics in the location in which you are applyingltbrgtltbrgtFor job positions in San Francisco CA and other locations where required we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction recordsltbrgtltbrgt
